title: KODAK 80 cm (32 inch) HD Ready LED Smart TV  (32HDXSMART / 32HDXSMART V1)

product_specification.In The Box: 1U (1 LED TV, 1 Remote, 1 Manual, 1AAA Battery with wall mtg.)
product_specification.Other Video Features: Built-in Digital Media, Digital Audio Output to Connect External Audio Systems, Digital Noise Reduction, Response Time: 6.5 ms
product_specification.Content Providers: Hotstar, Netflix, Youtube, Miracast, Aptoide TV
product_specification.Other Internet Features: Web Browser, Any View Cast (Screen Mirroring), TV Store, YouTube, Netflix, Facebook
product_specification.Other Connectivity Features: Movies Support in USB Mode, Component / Y Pb (Cb ) Pr (Cr ): 1, AV Input: 2, 1 x Component In (RGB Cable)
product_specification.Other Convenience Features: Moisture Resistant + Dust Resistant Components, Healthy from Inside, Parental Control Lock, Table Top Mount, Late Night Mode, Electronic Programming Guide (EPG), No Signal Power Off, Child and Program Lock, Favorite Channels List, Child Lock
product_specification.Covered in Warranty:
Defect arising out of Faulty or defective material or workmanship
Parts & Labour cost is covered
product_specification.Not Covered in Warranty:
Defects caused by improper use as determined by the company personnel
Modification or alteration of any nature is made in the electrical circuitry/or physical construction of the set
Installation/ repair work is carried out by persons/agency other than authorized by the company
The warranty does not cover any external accessories (such as battery, cable, carrying bag etc.)
Defects due to cause beyond control like lightning, abnormal voltage, acts of god or while in transit to service centre or purchaser's residence
Mentioned in the operating instruction manual supplied with this product or any cosmetic parts.
Original serial number is removed, obliterated or altered from the machine or cabinet
The product is not used according to instructions given in the instruction manual
Site (premises where the product is kept) conditions that do not confirm to the recommended operating conditions of the machine
product_specification.Installation & Demo Details: 1. Covered Under Standard Installation - Table Mounting Using Standard Stand Supplied as Accessory with TV - Extra Charges are Applicable for Wall Mounts as, Rs. 399 for 32 inch Display Size and Rs. 499 for >32 inch Display Size - Connecting with Available Power Source (within 1 Meter) - Connecting / Setting Up Various Available Input Source for Audio Video Based on Model - Connecting with Available WiFi (for Smart TV) - Checking TV for Proper Functioning - Demonstration of the TV and its Features

product_description.Anti-glare Panel: Every movie you watch and every video game you play on this TV is immersive. Its 80 cm (32) screen lets you get a close look at content while its anti-glare panel reduces light and contrast. You can watch TV for hours without straining your eyes.
product_description.Endless Entertainment: This smart TV features many built-in apps like YouTube and Netflix for your entertainment. Thanks to its Wi-Fi connectivity, you can even browse the internet and stream online videos on your TV.
